it.polimi.se2018.network.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main Server class. It runs both RMI and Socket servers and it handles lobbies and clients' connection
